com.xing.api

Class XingApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xing.api.XingApi

  • public final class XingApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Main access point for the XING API. Creates and holds instances of resources that provide access points and response/error handling for XING APIs.

    Usage: 

    
           // Will instantiate ContactsResource.
          ContactsResource resource = xingApi.resource(ContactsResource.class);

    Two states of XingApi are supported:

  • Logged in - Requires a user's access token and token secret (See XingApi.Builder.)
  • Logged out - See XingApi.Builder.loggedOut()
    • Since:
    2.0.0
